english.segment1: You're down all the way down. Cant shake the feeling. Youve tried. You learned how to hide. Youve got your reasons
english.segment2: I bet. Youre full of regret. Sweet and bitter. Please consider
english.segment3: Sore eyes. Whats up with that face. Think we can trace these lines. Back to fine. Im sure. Youve been here before. Sore eyes. Such a sight to see. If I can bring that light. Back to your eyes to stay. What would you say. Instead of walking away
english.segment4: No sign. of roses or wine. But youve got my attention. No lines. All out of rhymes. I just wanna hold you
english.segment5: I bet. Ill make you forget. Loves not bitter. Reconsider
english.segment7: Wipe away those sore eyes. You dont have to cry
